message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,800. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,800 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $11,200. This is a fair price for both of us, considering the value of the product to you. Let's make this deal!
I understand your position, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $11,000? I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway from our previous offers.
